name: Elder Ray Index Bull/Bear Power
question: Which stocks are showing Elder Ray bull power or bear power signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks have strong buying or selling pressure?
description: Analyzes Elder Ray Index bull power and bear power indicators to measure the strength of buyers versus sellers. Examines bull power (high minus EMA) and bear power (low minus EMA) to identify potential trend changes and momentum shifts.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Elder Ray analysis
Step 2: Get historical OHLC data for bull/bear power calculations
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for bull/bear power assessment
Step 4: Calculate Elder Ray bull power and bear power indicators with trend analysis
Step 5: Rank stocks by bull/bear power strength and momentum direction
